title: Poster, "Graphic Design China 2005 (GDC 05)", 2005
medium: Offset lithography on aluminized plastic foil
description: At center a faceless man standing with arms folded wearing a dark shirt and light pants.   At far top right a smaller scale of a faceless man standing with hands in his pant pockets.  Throughout poster there are smears.  At top center right vertically printed "In China".
